Color themes

As of version 2.0.0, theming your menu has become really easy. You'll probably only need to change the background color for the menu (and maybe include the theme-light.css file for lighter themes).

The menu on this page uses the default theme.

Click the menu-button in the header to open the menu and see for yourself how easy it is to customize your menu.

  • Default theme (#333333)
  • Default light theme (#F6F6F6)
  • Shades of gray
  • Dark gray (#555555)
  • Gray (#777777)
  • Gray (#CCCCCC)
  • Light Gray (#EEEEEE)
  • Color themes
  • Bordeau (#442222)
  • Army (#333322)
  • Navy (#323849)
  • Themeroller
  • Try the themeroller!
